item.title: The No-Brainer Dal Recipe
item.description: This article gives a very simple recipe for cooking dal, invented by my mom. It's easier than the recipes I found on the internet, and easier than the recipes that my friends use. This recipe is great if you want to reduce the time you spend cooking or if you're new to cooking and want to start simple.
item.dc:creator: Eklavya Sharma

item.title: Making a keyboard-navigable collapsible without JavaScript
item.description: A 'collapsible' is content whose visibility can be toggled by clicking something. However, users without a mouse should also be able to open the collapsed content. This article explains how to make a keyboard-navigable collapsible without using JavaScript.
item.dc:creator: Eklavya Sharma
